Package alix.util

Class ML

java.lang.Object
alix.util.ML
public class ML
extends java.lang.Object
Some useful tools to deal with “Markup Languages” (xml, but also html tag soup)

    • forChar

      public static char forChar​(java.lang.String ent)
      Get the char from an HTML entity like &gt; or &#128;. Will not work on supplementary char like &Afr; 𝔄 &x1d504; (3 bytes).
      Parameters:
